publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2398 Robert Brown: National Allotments Week 2008—That the Parliament welcomes National Allotments Week 2008, being held from 11 to 17 August 2008; believes that allotments can make a big contribution to healthier living and knowledge of the environment and the seasonality of food; notes the potential for positive links with local schools, and urges all local authorities to identify more high quality sites to satisfy the growing demand for allotments in Scotland.

S3M-2398National Allotments Week 2008 (lodged on 14 August 2008) Dr Richard Simpson*, Bill Kidd*, Des McNulty*, Kenneth Gibson*, Nanette Milne*, Ross Finnie*, Jamie Hepburn*, Jim Tolson*, Patricia Ferguson*, Jack McConnell*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Mike Pringle*, Gil Paterson*, Sarah Boyack*, Margaret Mitchell*
S3M-2398 National Allotments Week 2008 (lodged on 14 August 2008) Robin Harper*, Cathy Peattie*
